title: Price Drop 11/9...FS/FT T205 Tinker BVG 4 $115 OBO.
author: brian29575

posts.post_title: Price Drop 11/9...FS/FT T205 Tinker BVG 4 $115 OBO.
posts.post_content:
T205 Tinker BVG 4 reduced to $115 OBO PayPal gift. Looks very nice for the grade. Only wrinkle I see is on the back, half way down on right hand side near word "home"

Open to trades
